thread.section_title: Everything Track & Field Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Everything Track & Field | www.everythingtrackandfield.com
thread.title: melinda
thread.title_full: Everything Track & Field reviewed by melinda

author: melinda
title: melinda
text: I was happy to find a 4lb shot put for such a reasonable price. I understand supply and demand but most sites were charging far more for 6lb or even 4k shots than for a 4lb shot put. I was very pleased with the ease of locating the shot that I needed. I did order the 6lb from amazon because free shipping is preferable. Hopefully this order arrives quickly and my youngest throwers will finally have a practice shot that is not too heavy.
